duties_responsibilities.duty: Represent clients in personal injury cases and lead trial proceedings with proven success.
Work collaboratively with legal assistants, paralegals, and other attorneys to handle a volume of quality cases.
Utilize in-house marketing and business development resources to generate business and enhance brand visibility.
Foster an inclusive and empathetic environment with sensitivity in interactions with clients and colleagues.
Advocate for change in the law for the benefit of clients and the community.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Law or related field (Juris Doctor degree required)
